solution_line_template: If the ratio of red candles to blue candles Avianna bought was {red_ratio}:{blue_ratio}, then the total ratio was {red_ratio}+{blue_ratio} = {total_ratio}.

If {red_ratio} represented {red_candles} candles in the total ratio, then {total_ratio}, the actual ratio, represents {total_ratio}*{red_candles} = {total_ratio_times_red_candles} divided by {red_ratio} is {total_ratio_times_red_candles}/{red_ratio} = {total_candles} candles.

If the total number of candles was {total_candles}, then the number of blue candles is {total_candles} candles - {red_candles} candles = <<{total_candles}-{red_candles}={blue_candles}>>{blue_candles} candles
